alert.note: Alert for Jersey (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 8:31PM CDT until May 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Grafton. Mississippi River at Mel Price LD. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Clarksville. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Chester. Mississippi River at Louisiana. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Grafton. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Water begins flooding the floor at the Palisades Marina in Portage Des Sioux. Access to homes along North Shore Drive in eastern St. Charles County becomes cut off near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Sunday was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 17.2 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Mississippi River Grafton 20.0 20.5 19.9 19.4 18.8 18.2 17.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
